alert.note: Alert for Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 11 at 6:22PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gila and Maricopa Counties through 645 PM MST... At 622 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sycamore Creek to Ballantine Trailhead. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Round Valley, Ballantine Trailhead, Sycamore Creek, Sunflower, Roosevelt, Punkin Center, Tonto Basin, Roosevelt Dam and Four Peaks. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 207 and 229. AZ Route 188 between mile markers 243 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Mazatzal Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Tonto Basin
